text: isamen to shaq hee nahin ki khuda ne jis din aasamaan va zameen ko paida kiya (usee din se) khuda ke nazadeek khuda kee kitaab (lauhe mahaphooz) mein maheenon kee ginatee baarah maheene hai unamen se chaar maheene (adab va) huramat ke hain yahee deen seedhee raah hai to un chaar maheenon mein tum apane oopar (kusht va khoon (maar kaat) karake) zulm na karo aur musharekeen jis tarah tum se sabake bas milakar ladate hain tum bhee usee tarah sabake sab milakar un se ladon aur ye jaan lo ki khuda to yaqeenan parahezagaaron ke saath hai
